content: As a reader encountering this passage for the first time, I might feel a sense of intrigue and excitement at the sudden shift from serene imagery like snowflakes and snow-women to the unexpected mention of Yeti. The juxtaposition of these elements could spark my curiosity and imagination, making me wonder how they are connected or what kind of story is being set up by their inclusion together. The mention of Yeti in particular might evoke feelings of mystery or adventure, as it introduces a mythical creature into an otherwise familiar wintry setting. Overall, this passage might prompt me to engage with the text more actively in order to uncover its meaning and unravel any potential narrative threads that tie these disparate elements together.
